exception.impl: The implementation used cannot create OverviewMapControl.

textHelp.help1: Shows a general view with a box that corresponds to the area where we are in the main view.
textHelp.help2: The situation map box is synchronized with the main view. Allows you to scroll the main view, moving the box from the situation map.
textHelp.help3: To hide the location map again, click the 'Minimize' button.
